page.title: 07The Mobile Library Service
page.content: For people living in very remote areas the Somerset County Council Mobile Library Service is a great help. The Library Service is financed from the rates and is available to everyone without charge. Mobile libraries serve the rural areas of the county calling in each community at regular times. There is the Mobile Libray which visits with two members of staff and also the Travelling library which has only one librarian. It is a measure of the remoteness of this area and its scattered population that the fortnightly visits from the travelling library make only two stops in the whole block. It stops at 12.55 - 1.05 at Glasses Farm and 1.10 - 1.15 at Langridge Mill.
